Package hw4.game

Class HeroParty

java.lang.Object
hw4.game.HeroParty
All Implemented Interfaces:
Party
public class HeroParty extends Object implements Party
A party is a collection of non-fallen allies that represent a team. The behavior of this collection is FIFO (a queue). The hero at the front of the queue is next up for a battle round. If a hero is not defeated when battling in a round, they will be added to the back of the queue so they may combat again in the future.

  • Constructor Details

    • HeroParty

      public HeroParty(Team team, int seed)
      Create the party. Here we associate the team with the party. We then add the heroes in the following order: Berserker, Healer and Tank. The collection is then shuffled using the random number generator seed value. To shuffle the collection of heroes (assumed to be either an ArrayList or LinkedList):

      Collections.shuffle(this.heroes, new Random(seed));

      Parameters:
      team - the team
      seed - the random number generator seed
